mapper.select: SELECT exam_order.*, course_subject.id AS course_subject_id, course_subject.sname AS course_subject_sname FROM exam_order LEFT JOIN course_subject ON course_subject_id = course_subject.id WHERE customer_id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_order( coment ,detail_address ,method,order_number, pay_method ,status ,course_subject_id ,customer_id ,district_id ,tel ,real_name ) VALUES( #{examOrder.coment}, #{examOrder.detailAddress}, #{examOrder.method}, #{examOrder.orderNumber}, #{examOrder.payMethod}, #{examOrder.status}, #{examOrder.courseSubject.id}, #{examOrder.customer.id}, #{examOrder.osDistrict.id}, #{examOrder.tel}, #{examOrder.realName} );
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_order SET exam_order.`status` = #{examOrder.status}, submit_time = NOW() WHERE exam_order.id = #{examOrder.id} AND customer_id = #{examOrder.customer.id}
